snippet: The 11 billion pound merger between Standard Life and Aberdeen Asset Management will lead to some job losses but not the 1,000 figure that has been cited in media reports, the Aberdeen CEO said on Monday....

headline.main: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses
headline.print_headline: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses

lead_paragraph: The 11 billion pound merger between Standard Life and Aberdeen Asset Management will lead to some job losses but not the 1,000 figure that has been cited in media reports, the Aberdeen CEO said on Monday.
